text: Chitabu achi china ulonzi uwele Musa nakawalonjela wanhu weng'ha wa Isilaeli mhela lowawele mchiwala kolilawilaga isanya mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani. Nawali hali ibindi lya Yolodani behi na Sufu, hagati mwa muji wa Palani ubanzi umwe na muji wa Tofeli na Labani na Haseloti na Disahabu ubanzi wunji.
